name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Bitter Choco Decoration'.
A transition to a game section where Aki Rosenthal interacts with a giant die and board game squares.
Performance of the song 'Deal with the devil'.

subtitles.original: やっぱいいや
subtitles.english: Actually, never mind.

subtitles.original: 無駄に期待をさせぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to give useless hope

subtitles.original: 離れさせぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to let them leave

subtitles.original: 願わせぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to let them wish

subtitles.original: でも殺気は閉じ込めぬように
subtitles.english: But so as not to trap the bloodlust

subtitles.original: 笑わすように
subtitles.english: To make them laugh

subtitles.original: 笑わせるように
subtitles.english: To be made to laugh

subtitles.original: 人ちゃんと敬うように
subtitles.english: To properly respect others

subtitles.original: 崇めるように
subtitles.english: To revere

subtitles.original: 讃えるように
subtitles.english: To praise

subtitles.original: でも嫌味にならないように
subtitles.english: But so as not to be offensive

subtitles.original: ふざけないように
subtitles.english: So as not to mess around

subtitles.original: 集団参加の終身雇用 へらへら行っちゃって
subtitles.english: Lifelong employment in a group, went along grinning

subtitles.original: あれ 前髪超絶最強じゃん とか どうでもいいのに言っちゃって
subtitles.english: Oh, your bangs are totally the best, saying things like that even though I don't care

subtitles.original: マイバイブルも限界集落的 社会の終末です
subtitles.english: My bible is a marginal village-like social apocalypse

subtitles.original: 決して発狂しないように
subtitles.english: So as never to go insane

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 時に孤独な愛は君を汚す
subtitles.english: Sometimes lonely love pollutes you

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 立つ鳥の跡 濁さぬあとの
subtitles.english: A departing bird leaves no trace...

subtitles.original: はじめはあんなに奔放な
subtitles.english: At first, being so uninhibited

subtitles.original: 大言壮語 並べたが
subtitles.english: Lined up big talk

subtitles.original: 嫌々々々 嘘つきの味
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no, the taste of a liar

subtitles.original: いんやはや しかし今日が初めてで
subtitles.english: Geez, but today is the first time

subtitles.original: こんな事まで 君センスあるよ
subtitles.english: Even something like this, you have sense

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 F.U.C.K.Y.O.U. ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Ah, F.U.C.K.Y.O.U. Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 F.U.C.K.Y.O.U. ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Ah, F.U.C.K.Y.O.U. Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 厳守せよ 礼儀作法
subtitles.english: Observe etiquette strictly

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 皆が望む理想に憧れて
subtitles.english: Longing for the ideal everyone wants

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 個性や情を全部焼き払い
subtitles.english: Burn away all individuality and emotion

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 欲やエゴは殺して土に埋め
subtitles.english: Kill greed and ego and bury them in the dirt

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 僕は大人にやっと成ったよ ママ
subtitles.english: I've finally become an adult, Mama

subtitles.original: 明日の規則のその先を
subtitles.english: Beyond tomorrow's rules

subtitles.original: 地獄は続く どこまでも
subtitles.english: Hell continues everywhere

subtitles.original: ああ だからどうか今だけは
subtitles.english: Ah, so please, just for now

subtitles.original: 子供の頃の気持ちのままで
subtitles.english: Keep the feelings of your childhood

subtitles.original: 不様（ぶざま）に晒してやってこうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's show our unseemly sides

subtitles.original: ああ 思い出したわ あの時の生真面目さを
subtitles.english: Ah, I remembered the seriousness of that time

subtitles.original: やっぱいいや
subtitles.english: Actually, never mind.

subtitles.original: サイコロ...
subtitles.english: A dice...

subtitles.original: 5が出た。
subtitles.english: I rolled a five.

subtitles.original: ん？何これ？
subtitles.english: Hmm? What is this?

subtitles.original: 椅子？
subtitles.english: A chair?

subtitles.original: One, two, one...
subtitles.english: One, two, one...

subtitles.original: Deal with the devil
subtitles.english: Deal with the devil

subtitles.original: Up and down 浮世の常
subtitles.english: Up and down, it's just the way of the world

subtitles.original: 組んだ端から 解（ほど）けない
subtitles.english: Once it's built, it won't unravel

subtitles.original: 感じたいの そのまま
subtitles.english: I want to feel it as it is

subtitles.original: 出し抜いて 騒げ
subtitles.english: Outsmart them and make some noise

subtitles.original: 行き着く先には
subtitles.english: At the destination

subtitles.original: Hell or hell?
subtitles.english: Hell or hell?

subtitles.original: この世界に残る たったひとつの勝者こそが正義
subtitles.english: The only winner remaining in this world is justice

subtitles.original: 女は度胸 地を這わせるの あいつを
subtitles.english: A woman needs nerve; I'll make that guy crawl on the ground

subtitles.original: やれること 何だってやる 私は賭ケグルイのクイーン
subtitles.english: I'll do whatever it takes, I'm the Kakegurui Queen

subtitles.original: お見通しよ じゃんけん
subtitles.english: I see through you, Rock-Paper-Scissors

subtitles.original: 読みきって 全勝だ
subtitles.english: I'll read it all and win every time

subtitles.original: Dealを待って 見透かして 私のモノにする
subtitles.english: Wait for the deal, see through it, and make it mine

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single strand of your hair

subtitles.original: Only one, I'll take it over
subtitles.english: Only one, I'll take it over

subtitles.original: Able to win, you want it more
subtitles.english: Able to win, you want it more

subtitles.original: Yeah, 満たせやしないわ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it won't satisfy me

subtitles.original: Dealを待って Go up and down たまらないわ スリル
subtitles.english: Wait for the deal, go up and down, this thrill is irresistible

subtitles.original: 誰にも触らせない このマネー
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch this money

subtitles.original: Only one, I'll take it over. Sa, come on 覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: Only one, I'll take it over. Now come on, make up your mind

subtitles.original: トドメ刺してあげる My hand
subtitles.english: I'll give you the finishing blow, my hand

subtitles.original: 欲しがりね 良いじゃない 待て Baby
subtitles.english: You're greedy, aren't you? That's fine. Wait, baby

subtitles.original: タイマン 負けない 感じさせてよ LOVE Me
subtitles.english: Man-to-man, I won't lose, make me feel LOVE Me

subtitles.original: あなたの正体は ほら...
subtitles.english: Your true identity is, look...
